channel.title: How to make my self admin/owner on a 508?----Problem Solved
channel.description:
Hi, Im using a 508 server and I want to make my self a owner/admin, so if i go in to character files>mainsave my character is there but it is in a .DAT file and when i open it its all chinese or what ever the language is. Please help me!!!! Im soooo stuck Thanks. :confused: Lief
[Edit] Problem Solved

item.title: How to make my self admin/owner on a 508?----Problem Solved
item.dc:creator: @lief123 lief123
item.description:
@lief123 wrote:

Ok thanks guyz you solved my problem ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2009, 03:46:01 am[/size][hr]i agree with Chaos lol, thanks marcbob

and thanks a bit other guys for trying to help

Read full topic

item.title: How to make my self admin/owner on a 508?----Problem Solved
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

The only person here who knows what there talking about is Marcbob, open login.java and look for playerrights = 3 and change the name before it into yours.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my self admin/owner on a 508?----Problem Solved

item.title: How to make my self admin/owner on a 508?----Problem Solved
item.dc:creator: @eld0002 eld0002
item.description:
@eld0002 wrote:

Go to bin\data\characters\mainsave, Find your Username.
Open the File with a WordPad, Not a Notepad.
find Rights and change it to 2, 3 is hidden.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make my self admin/owner on a 508?----Problem Solved
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

search for login.java and change the username thats for mod/admin to yours. If you have espeon source its like rs2 something
